segments.text: What a gross mess with all that water spilling onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing, and no one's stopping it—how careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing there in the puddle, drying dishes like it's fine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are filthy, climbing on the stool with dirty hands into the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's probably full of crumbs now from their grabbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting, probably going to drop crumbs everywhere too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage like this will make the kitchen smell musty soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside looks clean and tidy, not like this sloppy interior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out in the wet spot—disgusting slip hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet, and she doesn't even wipe it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such neglect in a home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate she's holding looks spotless, but everything else is a wreck.
segments.speaker: PAR
